body_content.explanation: Non-faculty employees work, but do not teach, at a school, college, or university:
examples: It takes the typical university about six non-faculty professionals to service each 100 students.
The school has cut 30 nonfaculty jobs in the most recent restructure.

body_content.explanation: Non-faculty employees work, but do not teach, in a college or university faculty (= a group of departments that specialize in a particular subject or group of subjects).
